abbrev omnimath628_answer : ℕ := sorry
theorem omnimath628
: {n ∈ Set.Icc (10^6) (10^9) | 7 ∣ n ∧ ∃ m : ℕ, m^2 = n}.encard = omnimath628_answer :=
